head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LOWRY, JOHN T.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LOWRY, JOHN T.

block.p: LOWRY-John T. 78, of Huntington, NY, on June 2, 2000. Survived by wife of 49 years Charlotte T., daughter and son-in-law Nancy and Frederick Hastings of Cutler, Maine, and grandson Wilder Lowry Hastings; predeceased by son John T. Lowry Jr. N.Y.U. and Columbia Law School graduate, past president of Huntington Country Club's Huntington Purchase. Visitation 2-5 and 7-9 PM, Tuesday, June 6, at A.L. Jacobsen Funeral Home, 1380 New York Ave., Huntington Station. Funeral services 10 AM, Wednesday, June 7, at the funeral home; interment following at Pinelawn Memorial Park. Memorial donations to Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center, 1275 York Avenue, NY, NY 10021.
